tweets.text: ‚ÄòPoppy woke before dawn to see a winding ribbon of pure silver flowing beneath a perfect crescent moon. The river was calling to her.‚Äô The river is¬†calling to me on #EarthDay from the #SouthDowns. It is also calling  @enVAgency, @Noblefoods & all polluters to save our #rivers. https://t.co/nfRSCVZ2xM

The @EnvAgencyYNE often takes the opportunity to test its #flood sirens. Today, between 2pm ‚Äì 3pm the Hebden Bridge Flood Warning Siren will sound. This is a test and no action is required. https://t.co/cEyMCMiChQ

We have received a number of reports regarding brown discolouration and pollution to Steeton Beck, Steeton near Keighley.  

We are in attendance and are investigating, to try and find the source. https://t.co/D0aOHjdfTD

What does the @EnvAgency do? It has become dysfunctional. 60% of all river pollution is agricultural or water industry derived. The Agency‚Äôs job is to regulate and protect rivers from this. But it is dysfunctional and not fit for purpose #environmentalauditcom

tweets.text:
(6/8) #EarthDay21 üåé

Why is it important to conserve native mussels & oysters? What threats are they facing, & what can we do to improve this? @CZapitis of @DerbyUni explores this in his Stretch talk. Check out the accompanying resources!

Watch & share: https://t.co/ILzWP8d0kZ https://t.co/GAYOLKo3ax
Beautiful day to be on the Somerset Levels - @mattcardy and I are finding out how @EnvAgencySW would cope if one of the major pumping stations here went down. https://t.co/s1FBEa3C2f

Ok these opportunities don‚Äôt come around too often. How‚Äôd you like to lead the EA team improving our capital‚Äôs environment? Well if do then you have until 7th May to apply - what you waiting for? https://t.co/0yzK78ULQW @EnvAgencySE https://t.co/3hO6koiBLE
